Description: Fragment of double handle at neck join from a Koan pottery transport amphora. Clay medium brick-red; mixed inclusions; cream slip. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Name Sopatros. cf. Grace, V., 'Stamped amphora handles' in H. Colt (ed.), Excavations at Nessana 1 (London 1962) 1962, 124-5
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0083)
